content: A human is a member of the species Homo sapiens, which is a species of primates that includes modern humans and their ancestors. Humans are characterized by their highly developed brain and their ability to use language and communicate with each other. Humans are also characterized by their upright posture and their ability to walk on two legs, known as bipedalism. Humans have a wide range of physical and cultural characteristics, and they live in a variety of environments around the world.
